======Sets radiation leak damage of the buzzer.======
= Description =

Controls buzzer radiation damage to marine, it is recommended to sets it in the lower value to prevent too high damage. It need [[asw_buzzer_radiation_leak_enable.wiki|asw_buzzer_radiation_leak_enable]] enable
